languages.text: "Вместе с отцом мы смогли вычислить служащих Администратума, причастных к изменению данных в документах. После... пристрастного допроса они признались, что делали это по указанию кого-то из рода Версериан. Все должно было выглядеть так, будто они сами несут потери и убытки от возникших логистических и экономических проблем..."

traits.locale_text: "Вместе с отцом мы смогли вычислить служащих Администратума, причастных к изменению данных в документах. После... пристрастного допроса они признались, что делали это по указанию кого-то из рода Версериан. Все должно было выглядеть так, будто они сами несут потери и убытки от возникших логистических и экономических проблем..."

languages.text: "Father and I have managed to single out the Administratum clerks responsible for tampering with the data. Following a... heated interrogation, they confessed that they were following the orders of someone from House Werserian. Everything was supposed to look as though they were the ones suffering losses from the logistical and economic problems..."
languages.original_text: "Вместе с отцом мы смогли вычислить служащих Администратума, причастных к изменению данных в документах. После... пристрастного допроса они признались, что делали это по указанию кого-то из рода Версериан. Все должно было выглядеть так, будто они сами несут потери и убытки от возникших логистических и экономических проблем..."

traits.locale_text: "Together with Father, we have managed to single out the Administratum clerks responsible for the data changes. After a... heated interrogation, they have confessed that they were following the orders of someone from House Werserian. Everything should have looked like they were the ones suffering losses from the logistical and economic problems..."

Everything should have looked like they were the ones suffering losses from the logistical and economic problems..."

Following a... heated interrogation, they confessed that they were following the orders of someone from House Werserian. Everything was supposed to look as though they were the ones suffering losses from the logistical and economic problems..."

languages.text: 「父と一緒に、行政局の事務員からデータの改ざんに携わった者を探しました。それから…激しい尋問の末に、ウェルザリアン家の人物の指示で行ったと自白したんです。物流と経済的な問題で損失を被っているのは、彼らのほうであるように見せるつもりだったそうです…」
languages.original_text: "Father and I have managed to single out the Administratum clerks responsible for tampering with the data. Following a... heated interrogation, they confessed that they were following the orders of someone from House Werserian. Everything was supposed to look as though they were the ones suffering losses from the logistical and economic problems..."

traits.locale_text: 「父と一緒に、行政局の事務員からデータの改ざんに携わった者を探しました。それから…激しい尋問の末に、ウェルザリアン家の人物の指示で行ったと自白したんです。物流と経済的な問題で損失を被っているのは、彼らのほうであるように見せるつもりだったそうです…」

languages.text: “我与父亲大人一同找出了篡改数据的内政部职员。在经过……激烈的审讯后，他们承认，是奉韦尔森家族某些成员的命令行事。这些数据经过篡改之后，看起来就像是韦尔森家族承受了物流和经济方面的损失一样……”
languages.original_text: "Father and I have managed to single out the Administratum clerks responsible for tampering with the data. Following a... heated interrogation, they confessed that they were following the orders of someone from House Werserian. Everything was supposed to look as though they were the ones suffering losses from the logistical and economic problems..."

traits.locale_text: “后来，我们就与父亲大人一同找出了篡改数据的内政部职员。在经过……激烈的审讯后，他们承认，是奉韦尔森家族某些成员的命令行事。这些数据经过篡改之后，看起来就像是韦尔森家族承受了物流和经济方面的损失一样……”

languages.text: « Père et moi avons remonté la source des documents et trouvé les clercs responsables des falsifications. Suite à un interrogatoire... poussé, ils ont avoué qu'ils ne faisaient que suivre les ordres d'un membre de la maison Werserian dont le but était de faire croire qu'ils étaient eux-mêmes les principales victimes de ces problèmes logistiques et économiques... »
languages.original_text: "Father and I have managed to single out the Administratum clerks responsible for tampering with the data. Following a... heated interrogation, they confessed that they were following the orders of someone from House Werserian. Everything was supposed to look as though they were the ones suffering losses from the logistical and economic problems..."

traits.locale_text: « Avec Père, nous avons remonté la source des documents et trouvé les clercs responsables des falsifications. Suite à un interrogatoire... poussé, ils ont avoué qu'ils ne faisaient que suivre les ordres d'un membre de la maison Werserian dans le but était de faire croire qu'ils étaient eux-mêmes les principales victimes de ces problèmes logistiques et économiques... »

languages.text: «Mi padre y yo hemos conseguido identificar a los trabajadores del Administratum responsables de la manipulación de los datos. Tras un acalorado interrogatorio, confesaron que seguían órdenes de alguien perteneciente a la casa Werserian. Todo debía apuntar a que eran ellos los que sufrían pérdidas debido a los problemas logísticos y económicos».
languages.original_text: "Father and I have managed to single out the Administratum clerks responsible for tampering with the data. Following a... heated interrogation, they confessed that they were following the orders of someone from House Werserian. Everything was supposed to look as though they were the ones suffering losses from the logistical and economic problems..."

traits.locale_text: «Junto con mi padre, hemos conseguido identificar a los trabajadores del Administratum responsables de la manipulación de los datos. Tras un acalorado interrogatorio, confesaron que seguían órdenes de alguien perteneciente a la casa Werserian. Todo debía apuntar a que eran ellos los que sufrían pérdidas debido a los problemas logísticos y económicos».

languages.text: "Vater und ich konnten die Schreiber im Administratum identifizieren, welche die Daten manipuliert haben. Nach einem ... intensiven Verhör haben sie gestanden, dass sie auf Befehl eines Mitglieds des Hauses Werserian gehandelt haben. Es sollte so aussehen, als würden sie durch die logistischen und wirtschaftlichen Probleme Verluste erleiden ..."
languages.original_text: "Father and I have managed to single out the Administratum clerks responsible for tampering with the data. Following a... heated interrogation, they confessed that they were following the orders of someone from House Werserian. Everything was supposed to look as though they were the ones suffering losses from the logistical and economic problems..."

traits.locale_text: "Vater und ich konnten die Schreiber im Administratum identifizieren, welche die Daten manipuliert haben. Nach einem ... intensiven Verhör haben sie gestanden, dass sie auf Befehl eines Mitglieds des Hauses Werserian gehandelt haben. Es sollte so aussehen, als würden sie durch die logistischen und wirtschaftlichen Probleme Verluste erleiden ..."

languages.text: "Verilerle oynayan Administratum kâtiplerini babamla birlikte saptadık. Hararetli bir sorgu sürecinin ardından bir Werserian Hanesi mensubunun emirlerine uyduklarını itiraf ettiler. Werserian Hanesi'nin lojistik ve ekonomik sorunlardan en çok etkilenen taraf olarak yansıtılmasını amaçlamışlar..."
languages.original_text: "Father and I have managed to single out the Administratum clerks responsible for tampering with the data. Following a... heated interrogation, they confessed that they were following the orders of someone from House Werserian. Everything was supposed to look as though they were the ones suffering losses from the logistical and economic problems..."

traits.locale_text: "Verilerle oynayan Administratum kâtiplerini babamla birlikte saptadık. Hararetli... bir sorgu sürecinin ardından bir Werserian Hanesi mensubunun emirlerine uyduklarını itiraf ettiler. Werserian Hanesinin lojistik ve ekonomik sorunlardan en çok etkilenen taraf olarak yansıtılmasını amaçlamışlar..."
